articles.author: Gloria Li, Demetri Sevastopulo, Chan Ho-him, Nian Liu, Joe Leahy
articles.title: Chinese students shaken by US visa crackdown look for Plan B - Financial Times
articles.description: Prospective scholars think twice about Trump’s America and consider applying to universities elsewhere
